summary: Improves most of the Daedric Artifacts
descriptionHtml:
The Daedric Artifacts are meant to be the most powerful weapons and armor in Skyrim. But wait.....
A simple ebony greatsword does more damage? NO WAY!!!!! 
This mod aims to make these Items as powerful as they should be.
Improved items:

Volendrung
-Increased Damage/Weight
-Deacreased swing speed
-New enchantment: Absorbs Health and staggers Enemys
-Requires Dwarven Smithing Perk to improve

Ebony Mail
-Increased armor rating
-Requires Ebony Smithing Perk to improve

Ebony Blade
-Swings slower
-Does more damage
-Absorbs more health

Mace Of Molag Bal
-Increased damage
-ABSORBS stamina and magicka
-Requires Daedric Smithing Perk to improve

Namira\'s Ring
-Increases health by 50

Skull Of Corruption
-Increased overall damage

Dawnbreaker
-Increased damage and fire damage
-Requires Daedric Smithing Perk to improve

Spellbreaker
-Increased armor rating
-Requires Dwarven Smithing Perk to Improve

Savior\'s Hide
-Increased armor rating
-Increased Magic/Poison resistance
-Requires Advanced Armors Perk to improve

Masque Of Clavicus Vile
-Increased armor rating
-Increased Speech bonuses
-Requires Daedric Smithing Perk to Increase

Rueful Axe
-Increased Damage
-Swings faster
-Absorbs health
-Requires Daedric Smithing Perk to improve

Merune\'s Razor
-Increased damage
-Does fire damage
-Requires Daedric Smithing Perk to improve


This is my very first mod so feel free to give advise and critics :-)!
author: Ocramrenegew
